Vivant Skincare 3% Mandelic Acid 3-in-1 Toner

Brand: Vivant

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water, Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Mandelic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Glycine, Fructose, Urea, Niacinamide, Inositol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid

Directions: Moisten a cotton pad with a small amount of tonic and wipe over face, neck, and d collet

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
